sect1.title: LDAP Validation and Checking
sect1.para: SLEPOS contains LDAP validation and checking tools. Simple validation and checking is automatically performed during each posAdmin addition or modification call. Full validation is performed during SLEPOS XML import or on demand via the following command:

There is an important difference between LDAP validation during XML import and validation invoked by the posAdmin --validate command. If important LDAP objects are found missing during the XML import, the missing objects are reported, but the import continues without a failure. In contrast, calling posAdmin --validate returns an error the first time a file is missing and stops validation.
